   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          tls13_client_tls11_server/0,
   60:          tls13_client_tls11_server/1,
   61:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   62:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   63:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   64:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   65:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   66:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   67:          renegotiate_error/0,
   68:          renegotiate_error/1,
   69:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/0,
   70:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/1,
   71:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/0,
   72:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/1
   73:         ]).
   74: 
   75: 
   76: %% Test callback
   77: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   78: 
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   81: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   82: all() -> 
   83:     [
   84:      cert_groups()
   85:     ].
   86: 
   87: groups() ->
   88:     [
   89:      {rsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()},
   90:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
   91:     ].
   92: 
   93: cert_groups() ->
   94:     [{group, rsa},
   95:      {group, ecdsa}].
   96: 
   97: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
   98:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
   99:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
  100:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
  101:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  102:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  103:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
  104:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
  105:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  106:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  107:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  108:      renegotiate_error,
  109:      client_cert_fail_alert_active,
  110:      client_cert_fail_alert_passive   
  111:     ].
  112: legacy_tests() ->
  113:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  114:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  115:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  116:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  117:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  118:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  119:      tls13_client_tls11_server
  120:     ].
  121: 
  122: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  123:     catch crypto:stop(),
  124:     try crypto:start() of
  125: 	ok ->
  126:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  127:                 true ->
  128:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  129:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  130:                      Config];
  131:                 false ->
  132:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  133:             end
  134:     catch _:_ ->
  135: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  136:     end.
  137: 
  138: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  139:     ssl:stop(),
  140:     application:stop(crypto).
  141: 
  142: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  143:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  144:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  145:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  146:     [{client_type, erlang},
  147:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  148:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  149: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  150:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  151:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  152:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  153:         true ->
  154:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  155:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  156:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  157:             [{client_type, erlang},
  158:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  159:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  160:         false ->
  161:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  162:     end.
  163: 
  164: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  165:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  166: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  167: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  168: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  169: 
  170: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  171:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  172: 
  173: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  174:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  175:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  176:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  177:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  178:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  179:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  180: 
  181: 
  182:     
  183: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  184:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  185:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  186: 
  187: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  188:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  189:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  190: 
  191:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  192:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  193:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  194:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  195:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  196:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  197:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  198:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  199:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  200:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  201:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  202:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  203:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  204:    
  205: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  206:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  207: 
  208: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  209:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  210:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  211:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  212:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  213:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  214:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  215: 
  216: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  217:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  218: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  219:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  220:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  221:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  222:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  223:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  224:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  225:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  226:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  227:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  228:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  229:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  230:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  231:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  232: 
  233: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  234:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  235: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  237:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  238:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  239:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  240:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  241:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  242:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  243:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  244:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  245:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  246:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  247:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  248:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  249:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  250: 
  251: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  252:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  253: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  255:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  256:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  257:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  258:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  259:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  260:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  261: 
  262: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  263:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  264: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  265:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  266:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  267:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  268:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  269:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  270:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  271:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  272:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  273:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  274:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  275:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  276:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  277:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  278: 
  279: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  280:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  281: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  282:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  283:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  284:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  285:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  286:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  287:     
  288:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  289:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  290:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  291:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  292:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  293:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  294:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  295:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  296: 
  297: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  298:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  299: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  300:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  301:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  302:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  303:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  304:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  305:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  306:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  307: 
  308: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  309:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  310: 
  311: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  312:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  313:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  314:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  315:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  316:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  317:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  318:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  319:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  320: 
  321: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  322:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  323: 
  324: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  325:     SHA = sha384,
  326:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  327:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  328:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  329:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  330:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  331:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  332:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  333:                                                                               {client_chain,
  334:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  335:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  336:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  337:                                                                              ]),
  338: 
  339:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  340:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  341:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  342:                   | ServerOpts0],
  343:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  344: 
  345: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  346:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  347: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  348:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  349:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  350:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  351:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  352:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  353:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  354: 
  355: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  356:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  357: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  358:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  359:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  360:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  361:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  362:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  363: 
  364: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  365:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  366: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  367:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  368:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  369:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  370: 
  371:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  372: 					{from, self()},
  373:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  374:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  375:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  376:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  377:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  378:                                                   {from, self()},
  379:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  380:                                                   {options,
  381:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  382:     Server ! listen,
  383:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  384:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  385:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  386:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  387:                                                      {from, self()},
  388:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  389:                                                      {options,
  390:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  391:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  392:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  393:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  394: 
  395: renegotiate_error() ->
  396:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  397: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  398:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  399:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  400:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  401: 
  402:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  403: 					{from, self()},
  404:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  405:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  406:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  407:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  408:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  409:         {ok, Socket} ->
  410:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  411:         {error, Reason} ->
  412:             ct:fail(Reason)
  413:     end.
  414: 
  415: client_cert_fail_alert_active() ->
  416:     [{doc, "Check that we receive alert message"}].
  417: client_cert_fail_alert_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  418:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  419:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  420:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  421:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  422:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  423: 
  424:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "clinet_invalid_cert.pem"),
  425:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  426: 
  427:     ClientOpts = [{active, true},
  428:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  429:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  430:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  431:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  432:                                         {from, self()},
  433:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  434:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  435:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  436:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  437:     receive
  438:         {Server, {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}}} ->
  439:             receive
  440:                 {ssl_error, Socket, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}} ->
  441:                     ok
  442:             after 500 ->
  443:                     ct:fail(no_acticv_msg)
  444:             end
  445:     end.
  446: 
  447: client_cert_fail_alert_passive() ->
  448:     [{doc, "Check that recv or setopts return alert"}].
  449: client_cert_fail_alert_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  450:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  451:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  452:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  453:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  454:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  455: 
  456:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  457:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  458: 
  459:     ClientOpts = [{active, false},
  460:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  461:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  462:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  463:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, recv,
  464:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  465:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, setopts,
  466:                   ServerNode, Hostname).
  467: 
  468: tls13_client_tls11_server() ->
  469:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client gets old server alert from TLS 1.0 server."}].
  470: tls13_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  471:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  472:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  473:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
  474: 
  475: 
  476: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  477: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  478: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  479: 
  480: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  481:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  482:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  483: 					{from, self()},
  484:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  485:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  486:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  487:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  488: 					{host, Hostname},
  489:                                         {from, self()},
  490:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  491:                                         {options,
  492:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  493:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  494: 
  495: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  496:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  497:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  498:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  499:             ok;
  500:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  501:             ok;
  502:         _ ->
  503:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
  504:     end.
  505: 
  506: alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, Function,
  507:               ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  508:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  509:                                         {from, self()},
  510:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  511:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  512:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  513:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  514:     ct:sleep(500),
  515:     case Function of
  516:         recv ->
  517:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0);
  518:         setopts ->
  519:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}])
  520:     end.
  521: 
  522: create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts) ->
  523:     KeyFile =  proplists:get_value(keyfile, ClientOpts),
  524:     [KeyEntry] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(KeyFile),
  525:     Key = ssl_test_lib:public_key(public_key:pem_entry_decode(KeyEntry)),
  526:     ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  527: 
  528:     [{'Certificate', ClientDerCert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  529:     ClientOTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(ClientDerCert, otp),
  530:     ClientOTPTbsCert = ClientOTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  531:     NewClientDerCert = public_key:pkix_sign(ClientOTPTbsCert, Key),
  532:     ssl_test_lib:der_to_pem(NewClientCertFile, [{'Certificate', NewClientDerCert, not_encrypted}]).
